Name: Quarry Simulator 2021
About the game: Quarry Simulator - innovation simulator and economical strategy about creation of the quarries. You beginner magnat and you need earn some money for his bussiness. For beggining, you need to choose the place of your quarry, after you need to buy excalators and place them into the quarry. After you can extract some resources from the ground and exchange them for money. Computer Physics Simulator 2023 is here!
